code: import{FETCH_ACTIVITIES,FETCH_ACTIVITIES_ERROR,FETCH_ACTIVITIES_SUCCESS}from'./activityConstants';export var fetchActivities=function fetchActivities(eventId){return{type:FETCH_ACTIVITIES,eventId:eventId};};export var fetchActivitiesSuccess=function fetchActivitiesSuccess(data){return{type:FETCH_ACTIVITIES_SUCCESS,data:data};};export var fetchActivitiesError=function fetchActivitiesError(data){return{type:FETCH_ACTIVITIES_ERROR,data:data};};
